item.title: 罗纳尔多的沙特联赛主场有望拍摄系列纪录片
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，罗纳尔多和小内马尔所在的沙特阿拉伯足球联赛正在洽谈制作系列纪录片，希望将其出售给 Netflix 等流媒体公司。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s football league, home to Ronaldo and Neymar Jr., is in talks to produce a documentary series it hopes to sell to streaming companies such as Netflix Inc., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 私人信贷筹资创 2020 年以来最低水平
item.description: 由于通胀率居高不下，美联储又让投资者做好了利率将在更长时间内保持高位的准备，私人信贷资金的筹集创下了2020年以来的最低水平。【原文：Private credit fundraising scraped the lowest level in any quarter since 2020 as inflation remains stubbornly high and the Federal Reserve primes investors for interest rates to stay elevated for longer.】

item.title: 花旗集团的霍伦霍斯特逆流而上，认为利率将大幅下调，并将硬着陆
item.description:
他说，"从所有数据来看，就业市场的趋势是疲软"

item.title: 拖拉机制造商 CNH 和 AGCO 因农民需求疲软而下调业绩展望
item.description: 拖拉机制造商 CNH Industrial NV 和 AGCO Corp.下调了 2024 年的业绩展望，原因是种植者继续受到农作物价格下跌的挤压，农机销售量下降。【原文：Tractor makers CNH Industrial NV and AGCO Corp. reduced their outlooks for 2024 on declining sales of farm machinery as growers continue to be squeezed by falling crop prices.】

item.title: 比尔-格罗斯称他开创的 "全收益 "策略 "已死
item.description: 比尔-格罗斯（Bill Gross）在 20 世纪 80 年代开创了 "总回报 "策略，彻底改变了债券市场，他说这种方法现在已经过时了。【原文：Bill Gross, who pioneered the “total return” strategy in the 1980s that revolutionized the bond market, says the approach is now defunct.】

item.title: 期权交易员为一年来最大的 S&P 就业日波动做好准备
item.description: 期权市场押注周五美国就业报告公布后股市将大幅波动，交易商预计该报告将进一步明确美联储今年可能降息的幅度。【原文：The options market is betting that stocks will swing widely after Friday’s US jobs report, which traders expect will offer more clarity on how much the Federal Reserve may cut interest rates this year.】

item.title: 比特币矿商酝酿出售，Stronghold Digital股价大涨
item.description: Stronghold Digital Mining Inc.正在权衡出售公司和其他替代方案，因为比特币代码更新 "减半 "后，挖矿收入大幅减少，竞争日益激烈。【原文：Stronghold Digital Mining Inc. is weighing the sale of the company and other alternatives with competition increasing in the wake of a Bitcoin code update called the “halving” that drastically reduces mining revenue.】

item.title: 顶级煤矿企业利润增长 26%，员工成本下降
item.description: 全球最大的煤炭生产商印度煤炭有限公司（Coal India Ltd.）第四季度利润增长了 26%，主要得益于工资支出的下降和向客户发货量的增加。【原文：Coal India Ltd., the world’s largest producer of the commodity, reported a 26% increase in fourth-quarter profit, driven by a drop in salary expenses and higher shipments to customers.】

item.title: 假化肥可能导致肯尼亚农业部长下台
item.description: 在政府机构通过补贴项目分发假化肥之后，肯尼亚议员要求解除该国农业部长的职务，这是威廉-鲁托总统的政府遭遇的最新丑闻。【原文：Kenyan lawmakers are demanding the dismissal of the nation’s agriculture secretary after government agencies distributed fake fertilizer through a subsidy program, the latest scandal to hit President William Ruto’s government.】

item.title: 花旗集团称欧元区第一季度薪酬增长保持坚挺
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup）经济学家表示，欧元区第一季度的工资谈判可能未能放缓，这主要归功于德国的工资谈判加速。【原文：Negotiated wages in the euro area probably failed to slow in the first quarter, thanks mostly to an acceleration in Germany, according to Citigroup economists.】

item.title: 诺和诺德的交易价格大幅低于礼来，即使涨幅已达 350
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）在过去四年中的涨幅超过 350%，如果这家减肥药公司要缩小与美国竞争对手的差距，可能还需要继续努力。【原文：Novo Nordisk A/S’s more than 350% rally over the past four years may have further to run if the weight-loss drug firm is to close the gap with its US competitor.】

item.title: 盎格鲁值多少钱？目前它的价值低于其各部分的总和
item.description: 在必和必拓集团考虑下一步行动之际，矿业界的银行家、分析师和竞争对手生产商的高管们面临着一个大问题：英美资源集团到底值多少钱？【原文：As BHP Group considers its next move, there’s one big question facing the mining world’s bankers, analysts and executives at rival producers: What’s Anglo American Plc actually worth?】

item.title: 有了 ZiG，津巴布韦有望最终扭转通胀局面
item.description: 津巴布韦中央银行表示，津巴布韦以黄金为支撑的新货币 ZiG 将消除阻碍经济发展的高通胀，并使这个南部非洲国家成为物价压力失控的典型代表。【原文：Zimbabwe’s new gold-backed ZiG currency will banish sky-high inflation that’s hamstrung the economy and made the southern African nation a poster child for runaway price pressures, the central bank said.】

item.title: 阿联酋石油巨头在欧佩克会议前上调产能数据
item.description: 阿拉伯联合酋长国的主要石油公司表示，在该国与欧佩克+国家举行会议决定 2024 年下半年产量水平的一个月前，该公司已提高了产能。【原文：The United Arab Emirates’s main oil company said it had bolstered its production capacity, a month before the country meets with fellow OPEC+ nations to decide output levels for the second half of 2024.】

item.title: 摩根大通看空英镑，指出 5 月份英镑长期亏损的历史原因
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co）称，英镑兑美元汇率本月将继续下滑，该公司认为英镑在5月份有走软的趋势。【原文：The pound is set to extend its slide against the US dollar this month, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co, which cites the currency’s tendency of weakening in May.】

item.title: 挑战者公司称四月份美国公司宣布招聘的新员工数量减少
item.description: 周四发布的一份报告显示，美国公司在4月份缩减了招聘计划，雇主宣布的新招聘人数是2016年以来前四个月最少的。【原文：US companies pared back hiring plans in April, with employers announcing the fewest new hires in the first four months of the year since 2016, according to a report released Thursday.】

item.title: 苹果财报带来低门槛和巨大回购希望
item.description: 苹果公司（Apple Inc. ）在收盘后公布第二季度财报时面临着一些不同寻常的问题：低预期。【原文：Apple Inc. is facing something unusual as it gears up to report its second-quarter results after the close: low expectations.】

item.title: 中国气候特使在华盛顿提出经济诉求

item.title: Blackstone 在 1 万亿美元信贷计划中挖掘大量现金来源
item.description:
与阿波罗和 KKR 一样，收购巨头正在与保险公司建立密切联系，以寻求新业务和准备好的资金。监管机构开始担心。【原文：

Like Apollo and KKR, the buyout giant is forging close ties with insurance firms as it hunts for new business and ready money. Regulators are starting to worry.

item.title: 新加坡金管局禁令结束几天后，新加坡星展银行的数字服务受到冲击
item.description: 星展集团控股有限公司（DBS Group Holdings Ltd.）周四在新加坡的网上银行和支付服务再次受到干扰，而此前几天，新加坡中央银行因类似故障而实施的为期六个月的禁令已经结束。【原文：DBS Group Holdings Ltd. was hit by renewed disruptions to its Internet banking and payment services in Singapore on Thursday, days after a six-month ban by the island’s central bank over similar glitches ended.】

item.title: 日航称日元持续暴跌损害底线
item.description: 日元跌至 34 年来的最低点，损害了日本航空公司的利润，该公司还警告说，日元的持续疲软正在给未来一年的前景蒙上阴影。【原文：The yen’s slump to a 34-year low is hurting profit at Japan Airlines Co., which also warned that the currency’s enduring weakness is clouding its outlook for the year ahead.】

item.title: 香港监察机构起诉 Segantii 夫妇内幕交易案
item.description: 香港证券监察机构开始对 Segantii Capital Management Ltd. 创始人西蒙-赛德勒及其前交易员丹尼尔-拉罗卡（Daniel La Rocca）提起刑事诉讼，指控他们涉嫌内幕交易，这是香港最受瞩目的对冲基金之一。【原文：Hong Kong’s securities watchdog started criminal proceedings against Segantii Capital Management Ltd. founder Simon Sadler and its former trader Daniel La Rocca over alleged insider dealing, prosecuting one of the most high-profile hedge funds in the city.】

item.title: 挪威北海油田现金流因天然气市场疲软而下滑
item.description: 由于天然气价格暴跌，挪威第一季度的油气田收益比去年同期骤降近一半。【原文：Norway’s first-quarter earnings from its oil and gas fields plunged by almost half from a year earlier as natural gas prices tumbled.】

item.title: 法国干邑生产商推动就中国倾销调查达成协议
item.description: 干邑制造商被指控在中国倾销法国白兰地，他们呼吁在习近平主席对法国进行国事访问之前达成一项协议，以结束这一争端。【原文：Cognac makers hit with allegations of dumping French brandy in China called for a deal to end the dispute ahead of President Xi Jinping’s state visit to France.】

。【原文：

Citadel Securities is leading a suit seeking to have the SEC's Consolidated Audit Trail declared illegal

item.description: 早上好。市场对美联储的不确定反应仍在继续，苹果财报成为焦点，日元又度过了疯狂的一天。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. The uncertain market reaction to the Fed continues, Apple earnings are in focus and the yen has another wild day. Here’s what traders are talking about. — David Goodman】

item.title: 日本贸易公司称日元疲软有损海外扩张努力
item.description: 日本贸易公司的高层管理人员警告说，日元暴跌将抑制他们拓展海外业务的努力。【原文：Top executives at Japan’s trading houses have warned that the tumbling yen will crimp efforts to expand business overseas.】

item.title: 美联储公布就业数据后，国债延续涨势
item.description: 在一系列美国数据公布之前，国债上涨，这些数据可能支持美联储今年仍将降息的押注，尽管有迹象表明通胀下降趋势已经停滞。【原文：Treasuries rose ahead of a barrage of US data that may support bets the Federal Reserve will still cut interest rates this year, despite signs the downtrend in inflation has stalled.】
